title: Master mind
summary: Master mind movie

title: The Last Heist
summary: A group of criminals plan a heist of a high-security bank.

title: The Lost Expedition
summary: A group of explorers search for a lost city in the jungle.

title: The Double Agent
summary: A spy goes undercover to stop a terrorist attack.

title: The Final Countdown
summary: A team of astronauts travel back in time to stop a nuclear war.

title: The Perfect Heist
summary: A group of thieves attempt to rob a casino.

title: The Last Stand
summary: A sheriff and his deputies defend their town against a gang of outlaws.

title: The Hacker
summary: A computer expert hacks into a top-secret government system.

title: The Art of the Steal
summary: A con artist tries to steal a valuable painting.

title: The Escape Plan
summary: A prisoner tries to break out of a maximum security prison.

title: The Perfect Target
summary: A hitman takes on his toughest assignment yet.

title: The Secret Agent
summary: A spy must stop a terrorist plot to destroy a city.

title: The Ultimate Fight
summary: Two martial artists battle for the championship.

title: The Treasure Hunt
summary: A group of adventurers search for lost treasure.

title: The Time Traveler
summary: A scientist travels back in time to stop a catastrophic event.

title: The Secret Society
summary: A journalist uncovers a hidden organization that controls the world.

title: The Perfect Crime
summary: A criminal mastermind pulls off the heist of the century.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Dark Knight
summary: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Pulp Fiction
summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
summary: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: Forrest Gump
summary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: Inception
summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: The Matrix
summary: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Goodfellas
summary: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

title: Saving Private Ryan
summary: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: The Usual Suspects
summary: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

title: The Green Mile
summary: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
